oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Williams Jr. Live at the Lone Star Café - 1978-07-19
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is from the Lone Star Café live show. The tape features a live performance of Hank Williams Jr. (musician). The Lone Star Café show is presented by Mort Cooperman, Bill McGivney and the WHN radio network. The recording of Hank Williams Jr. is from July 19, 1978.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams Jr.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) An unidentified host introduces Hank Williams Jr. and WHN's Lone Star Café show -- (00:24) Ed Bear introduces Hank Williams Jr. at the Lone Star Café -- (00:46) Rambling on My Mind (The Bama Band) -- (05:53) Bear praises the Bama Band and introduces how he first discovered Hank Williams Jr. -- (06:35) Jambalaya (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (08:52) Living Proof (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (12:14) Long Way to Hollywood (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (15:54) Stoned at the Jukebox (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (18:26) I Fought the Law (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (20:35) Montgomery in the Rain (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (25:42) Williams Jr. introduces his band and reflects on Hank Williams Sr. -- (27:52) You Cheatin' Heart (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (29:53) I'm So Lonesome I Could Cry (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (33:14) Whole Lotta Shakin' Goin' on (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (37:24) You Win Again (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (41:41) Are You Sure Hank Done it That Way (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (45:34) The Conversation (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (48:57) Feelin' Better (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (54:53) Unidentified fiddle tune [featuring Ed Bear outro voiceover] ([Unidentified]) -- (55:57) Love or Something Like it [featuring unidentified host] (Kenny Rogers)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Williams, Hank, Jr., 1949-;
